channel.title: Is there a RS2 Source that tries to emulate the actual game?
channel.description:
Most people seem to be going for a Runescape remix.. I just want an emulated RS2 or RSC (preferably RSC but meh.. its in production)
Yeah, I wanna make it my own server, because people love to steal all your &$@*& items on the real Jagex version of RS2. Java is easy to hack as it is...
So, I just want to know if there is a server source that acts like RS2.. without all the annoying added in "fresh ideas" that crash everything.. (example=Project 16's "put everything for lv 100 and up in every city everywhere! muahaha!")
Though I doubt I get any answers, one would be appreciated.

item.title: Is there a RS2 Source that tries to emulate the actual game?
item.dc:creator: @Laserous Laserous
item.description:
@Laserous wrote:

I didn’t really mean exactly… I can’t find a source that has the crafts coded and stuff like that, and testscape… errgh…

Sad thins is I’d feel more “at home” working on a RSC server… I never played RS2, so actually having a RS2 server is an entirely new feel, as well as I was never a member on RS… was allways free… I’ll keep searching…

Thus far the only one thats came remotely close to working and not crashing is Project 16V3.1… which is sad since V6 sucks … and uhh… theres all the stuff thrown in … everywhere…

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a RS2 Source that tries to emulate the actual game?

item.title: Is there a RS2 Source that tries to emulate the actual game?
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Well the only one that I know of is mine, but it is not nearly perfect, and there are a few codes, etc. Nothing big though. Mostly just stuff to teleport you places.

I suggest you start out with TestScape and work your way from there. That is what I did.

-Alexia

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a RS2 Source that tries to emulate the actual game?

item.title: Is there a RS2 Source that tries to emulate the actual game?
item.dc:creator: @danieb danieb
item.description:
@danieb wrote:

i have the original blackscape source by daiki it has nothing besides walking and item spawning
